hero_title: Skip the infrastructure. Ship your features.
hero_subtitle: A production-ready monorepo with auth, multi-tenant, RBAC, and an integrated AI team. Build your SaaS in minutes, not months.
features_subtitle: From authentication to AI-powered development, all the infrastructure is handled so you can focus on your business.
feature_fullstack_desc: TanStack Start frontend with NestJS + Fastify backend, all in a single monorepo powered by TurboRepo.
feature_auth_desc: Better Auth with email/password, OAuth providers, and session management. Ready out of the box.
feature_multitenant_desc: Row-Level Security on PostgreSQL. Organization hierarchy with complete tenant isolation.
feature_rbac_desc: Fine-grained RBAC with roles and permissions. Control access at every level of your application.
feature_typesafe_desc: Shared types across frontend and backend. Strict TypeScript everywhere, catch bugs before they ship.
feature_monorepo_desc: TurboRepo with shared packages for UI, config, and types. One codebase, maximum reuse.
feature_i18n_desc: Paraglide JS for compile-time i18n. Type-safe translations with zero runtime overhead.
feature_ai_desc: Integrated AI team with Claude Code. Specs, reviews, and implementation — all AI-assisted.
ai_subtitle: Two categories of AI agents work alongside you to build and operate your SaaS.
ai_cli_note: Universal CLI generated from OpenAPI specs — any AI or human can interact with your API.
dx_subtitle: Strong conventions and strict quality gates so you can move fast with confidence.
dx_tdd_desc: Tests before code, always. Vitest for unit & integration, Playwright for E2E.
dx_quality_desc: Lint, types, tests, coverage, and review — all required before merge.
dx_docs_desc: MDX documentation in the repo. API docs auto-generated from OpenAPI.
dx_tooling_desc: Biome for linting & formatting. Bun for blazing-fast builds.
cta_subtitle: Clone the repo and ship your first feature in under 5 minutes.
auth_reset_password_desc: Enter your email to receive a reset link
auth_toast_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_check_email_verify: Check your email to verify your account.
auth_check_email_reset: Check your email for a password reset link.
auth_check_email_magic_link: Check your email for a magic link.
auth_invalid_reset_link: This reset link is invalid or has expired.
auth_missing_token: Invalid link. Please request a new one.
auth_email_verified: Your email has been verified successfully.
auth_verification_failed: Email verification failed. The link may be invalid or expired.
auth_magic_link_sent_desc: We sent a magic link to sign you in
auth_magic_link_sent_message: We sent a magic link to {email}. Click the link in your email to sign in.
org_create_desc: Create a new organization to collaborate with your team.
org_settings_danger_desc: Deleting an organization is permanent and cannot be undone.
org_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this organization? This action cannot be undone.
org_settings_read_only: Only the organization owner can edit these settings.
org_members_remove_confirm: Are you sure you want to remove this member?
org_unsaved_changes: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
error_ROLE_SLUG_CONFLICT: A role with this name already exists
error_OWNERSHIP_CONSTRAINT: Only the owner can perform this action
demo_subtitle: Interactive examples showcasing the boilerplate's tech stack.
demo_store_desc: TanStack Store with reactive state management
demo_table_desc: TanStack Table with sorting, filtering, pagination
demo_table_subtitle: TanStack Table with sorting, filtering, and pagination
demo_form_simple_subtitle: Basic form with TanStack Form and Zod validation
demo_form_address_subtitle: Nested fields and validation with TanStack Form
demo_form_steps_subtitle: Complete the form to create your account
demo_form_steps_submitted: Your form has been submitted successfully.
demo_ssr_modes_desc: SPA, Full SSR, and Data-Only modes
demo_ssr_data_desc: Data fetched on server, rendered on client
demo_ssr_data_subtitle: Data fetched on server, rendered on client
demo_server_subtitle: TanStack Start server functions with file-based persistence
ds_colors_desc: The 8 semantic color tokens that seed the entire theme. Each value is in OKLch color space.
ds_colors_derived_desc: These CSS custom properties are derived from the seed colors above and applied as Tailwind utility classes.
ds_typography_desc: Font family, size scale, and heading hierarchy.
ds_typography_current_desc: Active typography settings from the theme configuration.
ds_typography_sample: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.
ds_typography_body_primary: This is a paragraph of body text demonstrating the default reading experience. Good typography creates a visual hierarchy that guides users through content. The line height, letter spacing, and font weight all contribute to readability.
ds_typography_body_secondary: This is a secondary paragraph using muted foreground for supplementary information. It uses a smaller font size and reduced visual weight compared to the primary text above.
ds_spacing_desc: Border radius scale derived from the base radius value. Current base: {radius}.
ds_spacing_scale_desc: Tailwind spacing utilities used throughout the design system.
ds_components_desc: Interactive previews of @repo/ui components. Adjust props using the controls below each component.
ds_compositions_desc: Real-world UI patterns assembled from @repo/ui components. Copy these patterns as starting points for your features.
ds_auth_create_account_desc: Get started with a free account
ds_auth_agree_terms: I agree to the Terms of Service
ds_data_profile_bio: Passionate about building accessible, performant web applications. Open source contributor and technical writer.
ds_feedback_success_desc: Your changes have been saved successfully.
ds_feedback_error_desc: There was an error processing your request. Please try again.
ds_feedback_warning_desc: Your account storage is almost full. Consider upgrading your plan.
ds_feedback_info_desc: A new version is available. Refresh the page to get the latest features.
ds_feedback_no_results_desc: It looks like there are no items yet. Get started by creating your first one.
ds_demo_alert_desc: This is an alert description with important information.
ds_demo_confirm_desc: This action cannot be undone. Are you sure you want to continue?
ds_demo_empty_state_desc: No items found. Create your first item to get started.
ds_demo_tab_content_1: Manage your account settings and preferences.
docs_error_loading_page: An error occurred while loading this documentation page.
auth_email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address
auth_login_email_not_verified: Please verify your email address. A new verification email has been sent.
auth_register_unable: Unable to create account. Please try again.
auth_register_email_exists: An account with this email already exists. Please sign in instead.
auth_reset_password_sent: If an account exists with this email, you'll receive a reset link.
org_slug_invalid: Slug must be lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only (no leading/trailing hyphens)
auth_verify_email_resend_neutral: If an account with this email exists and is not yet verified, a verification email has been sent.
auth_login_email_not_verified_sent: Your email is not verified. A new verification email has been sent. Check your inbox.
auth_magic_link_error: Unable to send magic link. Please try again.
auth_magic_link_no_account: No account found for this email. Check your address or create an account.
auth_magic_link_expired: This link has expired. Request a new one.
auth_magic_link_invalid: This link is invalid or has already been used.
auth_magic_link_unknown_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
auth_magic_link_sign_out_first: Sign out to use this link
auth_rate_limit: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
dashboard_org_context: You are working in the {name} organization.
dashboard_no_org: Select or create an organization to get started with your team.
dashboard_org_settings_desc: Manage your organization name, slug, and configuration.
dashboard_team_members_desc: Invite members, manage roles, and organize your team.
dashboard_documentation_desc: Browse guides, API references, and getting started docs.
talk_intro_subtitle: AI agents that write, test, review, and deploy production code. Not autocomplete — autonomous development.
talk_blocks_subtitle: Three pillars that transform Claude Code into a development workforce.
talk_blocks_claude_desc: Project-level instructions. Critical rules, coding standards, skill registry, agent definitions.
talk_blocks_skills_desc: Slash-invoked prompts that teach Claude Code complex, multi-step tasks with consistent quality.
talk_blocks_agents_desc: Role-specific .md files defining tools, permissions, domains, and skills.
talk_blocks_bottom: Combine these three and you get something powerful — a
talk_spec_subtitle: A generalist agent produces generic UI. A specialist produces production quality.
talk_spec_agent_desc: Scoped file boundaries, permitted tools, domain permissions. The agent knows exactly what it owns.
talk_spec_docs_desc: Mandatory reads before every task. Frontend patterns, testing standards, code review checklists.
talk_spec_skills_desc: Reusable skills that extend capabilities. Design guidance, library docs, commit automation.
talk_spec_result_desc: A focused agent that produces production-quality output instead of generic boilerplate.
talk_spec_example_desc: Knows its file boundaries (apps/web, packages/ui), reads frontend-patterns.mdx before every task, and has the ui-ux-pro-max skill for design decisions. A generalist agent produces generic UI. A specialist produces production quality.
talk_dev_subtitle: A 50-file mechanical change may be F-lite. A 3-file rate limiter may be F-full.
talk_dev_tier_s_criteria: 3 files or fewer, no architecture risk
talk_dev_key_insight_text: A 50-file mechanical change may be F-lite. A 3-file rate limiter may be F-full.
talk_dev_worktree_desc: Each issue gets its own worktree — isolated branch, deps, and DB. One Claude Code session per pane.
talk_dev_hook_posttooluse: Biome auto-format on every file edit
talk_dev_quality_rule_text: Lefthook for hard gates. Claude hooks for DX. Claude can't bypass git hooks.
talk_teams_subtitle: 9 agents, 3 categories. The orchestrator delegates — it never writes code.
talk_teams_orch_desc: Spawns agents, assigns tasks, synthesizes. Never writes code — preserves context window.
talk_teams_orch_do_1: Spawn specialized agents via Task tool
talk_teams_review_step_3: Human decides each finding via AskUserQuestion
talk_teams_review_why_text: An agent that wrote the code has sunk-cost bias — it won't question its own decisions. A fresh reviewer sees the code for the first time and challenges every choice, like a real code review.
talk_e2e_subtitle: Analysis, spec, code, review, deploy. Claude manages the full SDLC — including GitHub and Vercel.
talk_toolchain_subtitle: 16 skills organized by workflow phase. Each skill is a reusable, multi-step prompt.
talk_lessons_subtitle: Honest insights from 1,930 sessions of AI-assisted development.
talk_lessons_works_1: Subagents via Task tool — Claude handles coordination internally
talk_lessons_works_2: Specialized agents with domain docs + skills
talk_lessons_works_3: Fresh reviewers catch what authors miss
talk_lessons_doesnt_1: Multi-panel Agent Teams — coordination overhead exceeds benefit
talk_lessons_doesnt_2: Orchestrator writing code — burns context, produces worse results
talk_lessons_doesnt_3: Generalist agents — produce generic, boilerplate output
talk_lessons_changed_2: Skill ecosystem grew: 0 → 16 custom skills in 25 days
talk_lessons_changed_3: Human gates at every decision — not just code review
talk_closing_subtitle: Everything you need to replicate this process.
talk_index_claude_code_subtitle: Your AI development team. Skills, agents, and orchestration.
talk_index_devprocess_subtitle: From idea to production. Tiers, phases, and human gates.
talk_dp_divider_subtitle: The workflow is clear. Now let's explore the tools and patterns that power it.
talk_dp_intro_subtitle: From issue to production — every step, every gate, every artifact
talk_dp_tools_subtitle: Claude Code uses your tools, not just its own
talk_dp_tools_dashboard_desc: Live view of issues, status, and dependencies. Runs alongside bun run dev at port 3333.
talk_dp_tools_mcp_desc: Claude Code connects to GitHub, Vercel, Postgres, and any MCP-compatible service. Agents call these tools like any other.
talk_dp_tools_cli_desc: Aliases, tmux layouts, dev:clean, db:branch:create — Claude Code drives your entire local toolchain.
talk_dp_tools_callout: Agents don't just write code — they operate your entire toolchain
talk_dp_multi_subtitle: Same brief, different minds — pick the best result
talk_dp_multi_parallel_desc: frontend-dev + backend-dev + tester work concurrently on the same issue via shared task list
talk_dp_multi_reviewer_desc: No agent reviews code it wrote. Always a different agent for review — eliminates implementation bias
talk_dp_multi_escalation_desc: Agent hits a blocker → creates follow-up task → notifies lead. Work never silently stalls
talk_dp_plugins_subtitle: A plugin is a full capability bundle
talk_dp_plugins_workflow_desc: The Roxabi boilerplate is a plugin: /dev, /promote, 9 agents, Biome formatter hook, all bundled together
talk_dp_plugins_integration_desc: Connect Claude to external systems via MCP: GitHub issues, Linear tickets, Vercel deployments, Slack notifications
talk_dp_plugins_knowledge_desc: Inject live documentation into agent context via MCP servers
talk_dp_plugins_knowledge_after: With Context7: live docs at query time
talk_dp_plugins_callout: Plugins are composable — stack multiple in one project via .claude/plugins/
talk_dp_cicd_subtitle: Every push is automatically validated. Every merge is automatically deployed.
talk_dp_cicd_precommit: Pre-commit — Biome auto-formats on every file save
talk_dp_cicd_prepush: Pre-push — lint + typecheck + tests + i18n + license
talk_dp_cicd_actions: GitHub Actions — 5 parallel jobs on every PR
talk_dp_cicd_e2e: E2E — Playwright on PR, full matrix on main/staging
talk_dp_cicd_callout: Zero manual deploy steps — push to staging, promote to main, Vercel handles the rest
talk_dp_cca_subtitle: Automated PR review — triggered by GitHub, not by you
talk_dp_cca_step1: PR opened or pushed → workflow triggers
talk_dp_cca_step3: claude-code-action@v1 spins up Claude Code in CI
talk_dp_cca_step4: Claude reviews the diff, auto-fixes safe issues, commits if needed
talk_dp_cca_step5: Posts structured comment: Auto-fixed + Manual action needed
talk_dp_cca_badge_oauth: OAuth token = real Claude Code session
talk_dp_pipeline_subtitle: Five phases from problem to production
talk_dp_pipeline_conditional: * = conditional step (skipped based on tier or outcome)
talk_dp_tier_flite_steps: frame → spec → plan → implement → verify → ship
talk_dp_tier_ffull_steps: frame → analyze → spec → plan → implement → verify → ship
talk_dp_tier_insight_text: File count alone doesn't determine tier. A 50-file mechanical change may be S, while a 3-file rate limiter is F-full.
talk_dp_resume_title: Pick Up Where You Left Off
talk_dp_resume_subtitle: Artifacts persist — sessions don't have to
talk_dp_gates_subtitle: Every phase transition requires your approval
talk_dp_gates_ask_desc: Every choice presented as structured options — never plain-text questions
talk_dp_gates_roles_desc: Human decides, Claude orchestrates, agents specialize
talk_dp_hooks_subtitle: Git hooks and Claude Code hooks enforce quality at every step — no human action needed
talk_dp_hooks_git_desc: Triggered by git operations — block bad code before it reaches the repo
talk_dp_hooks_claude_desc: Triggered by tool use — enforce patterns during AI-assisted development
talk_dp_hooks_pre_commit_desc: Biome check — lint + format every staged file
talk_dp_hooks_pre_push_desc: Full suite — lint, typecheck, tests, i18n validation, license check
talk_dp_hooks_post_tool_desc: Auto-format files after every Write/Edit with Biome
talk_dp_hooks_pre_tool_desc: Block 'bun test' (must use 'bun run test'), warn on sensitive file access
talk_dp_hooks_insight_text: Hooks run automatically — they don't require human attention. They catch mistakes before they compound.
legal_mentions_data_protection_intro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the right to access, rectify, port, object to, and delete your personal data.
legal_mentions_data_protection_contact: To exercise these rights, you can contact our Data Protection Officer at the following address:
legal_cgu_article1_body: These Terms of Service (hereinafter "ToS") define the conditions of access and use of the service provided by {companyName} (hereinafter "the Service").
legal_cgu_article2_body: Use of the Service implies full and complete acceptance of these ToS. If you do not accept these terms, you must not use the Service.
legal_cgu_article3_body: The Service is a SaaS platform that allows users to manage their activities online. The exact features of the Service are described on the website.
legal_cgu_article4_body: The Service is available for free or through a paid subscription depending on available plans. {companyName} reserves the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue access to the Service at any time, with or without notice.
legal_cgu_article5_body1: All content on the Service (texts, images, logos, software, databases) is protected by intellectual property law and remains the exclusive property of {companyName} or its partners.
legal_cgu_article5_body2: Any unauthorized reproduction, representation, modification, or exploitation of all or part of the Service is prohibited.
legal_cgu_article6_body1: {companyName} strives to keep the Service accessible and functional but cannot guarantee permanent availability. {companyName} shall not be held liable for any interruption of the Service due to maintenance, updates, or any cause beyond its control.
legal_cgu_article6_body2: The user is solely responsible for their use of the Service and the content they publish on it.
legal_cgu_article7_body: The processing of personal data within the Service is governed by our
legal_cgu_article8_body: These ToS are governed by French law.
legal_cgu_article9_body: In the event of a dispute relating to the interpretation or execution of these ToS, the competent courts within the jurisdiction of the registered office of {companyName} shall have sole jurisdiction, unless otherwise provided by law.
legal_privacy_controller_intro: The data controller for personal data is
legal_privacy_controller_address: , whose registered office is located at
legal_privacy_data_collected_intro: As part of using the Service, we collect the following data:
legal_privacy_purposes_intro: The personal data collected is used for the following purposes:
legal_privacy_purpose_service_desc: creation and management of your user account, authentication, experience personalization
legal_privacy_purpose_security_desc: fraud detection and prevention, protection against unauthorized access
legal_privacy_purpose_stats_desc: analysis of Service usage to improve features (only with your consent)
legal_privacy_legal_basis_intro: The processing of your data relies on the following legal bases:
legal_privacy_basis_interest_desc: for Service security and fraud prevention
legal_privacy_basis_obligation_desc: for compliance with applicable regulatory requirements
legal_privacy_subprocessors_intro: We use the following sub-processors for the operation of the Service:
legal_privacy_rights_intro: In accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:
legal_privacy_right_access_desc: obtain confirmation that your data is being processed and receive a copy
legal_privacy_right_rectification_desc: request correction of inaccurate or incomplete data
legal_privacy_right_portability_desc: receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format
legal_privacy_right_objection_desc: object to the processing of your data on legitimate grounds
legal_privacy_right_deletion_desc: request the erasure of your personal data
legal_privacy_rights_contact: To exercise these rights, contact us at:
legal_privacy_authority_body: If you believe that the processing of your personal data constitutes a violation of the GDPR, you may file a complaint with the CNIL:
legal_cookies_what_body: A cookie is a small text file placed on your device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when you visit a website. It allows the site to remember information about your visit, such as your language preferences or other settings.
legal_cookies_necessary_body: These cookies are essential for the website to function. They ensure the security of your connection, manage your user session, and remember your consent preferences. They cannot be disabled.
legal_cookies_analytics_body: These cookies help us understand how you use the site by collecting information anonymously. This data allows us to improve the features and performance of the Service.
legal_cookies_marketing_body: These cookies allow us to show you relevant advertisements based on your interests. They may be placed by our advertising partners.
legal_cookies_duration_body: The consent cookie is retained for {duration}. When this period expires, the consent banner will be displayed again to collect your preferences.
legal_cookies_manage_body: You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking the button below or via the "Cookie Settings" link in the footer.
legal_cookies_manage_browser: You can also configure your browser to block or delete cookies. Note that disabling certain cookies may affect the website's functionality.
consent_banner_text: We use cookies to improve your experience. You can accept all, reject all, or customize your preferences.
consent_modal_description: Choose which cookies you want to allow.
consent_necessary_description: Essential cookies for the site to function
consent_analytics_description: Help us understand how you use the site
consent_marketing_description: Allow us to show you relevant advertisements
account_reactivation_deleted_on: Your account will be permanently deleted on {date}.
account_reactivation_scheduled: Your account is scheduled for permanent deletion.
account_reactivation_description: Your account is currently scheduled for deletion. You can reactivate it now to restore full access to your data.
account_reactivation_org_note: Note: If you had organizations scheduled for deletion, they will need to be reactivated separately from the organization settings page.
account_reactivation_permanent_desc: If you don't want to wait for the grace period, you can permanently delete your account and all data immediately. This action cannot be undone.
account_purge_confirm_desc: This will immediately and permanently delete your account, anonymize all your data, and remove all your sessions. This action cannot be undone.
account_purge_confirm_label: Type your email address to confirm
account_deleted_purged_desc: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted. This action is irreversible.
account_deleted_scheduled_desc: Your account has been scheduled for deletion.
account_deleted_removed_on: All your data will be permanently removed on {date}.
account_deleted_removed_grace: All your data will be permanently removed after the 30-day grace period.
account_deleted_changed_mind: Changed your mind? Simply log back in before the grace period expires to reactivate your account. All your data will be restored.
account_danger_zone_desc: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This action is reversible during a 30-day grace period.
account_delete_select_member: Please select a member to transfer ownership to for all organizations
account_delete_resolve_desc: You must decide what happens to your organizations before deleting your account.
account_delete_confirm_desc: This will schedule your account for permanent deletion. Your data will be removed after 30 days. You can reactivate by logging in during the grace period.
account_delete_confirm_email_label: Type your email address to confirm
org_reactivation_scheduled: This organization is scheduled for permanent deletion on {date}.
org_reactivation_contact: Contact an organization owner to reactivate this organization.
org_deletion_grace_period: The organization will be permanently deleted after 30 days.
org_unsaved_desc: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
profile_description: Update your name and display preferences.
avatar_description: Choose a generated avatar style. Customize the look with options below.
avatar_seed_hint: Different seeds generate different avatars. Leave empty to use your user ID.
avatar_url_length_warning: Avatar URL is too long. Simplify options or change style to save.
account_email_description: Change your email address. A verification link will be sent to the new address.
account_type_oauth_description: Your account is linked via a social provider. Email and password settings are managed through your provider.
account_org_ownership_description: You own the following organizations. Choose what happens to each one before deleting your account.
api_keys_empty_description: Create an API key to integrate with external services.
api_keys_create_description: Create a new API key for programmatic access. The key will be shown once after creation.
api_keys_no_scopes_warning: This key will have no permissions. It can authenticate but all permission checks will fail.
api_keys_expiry_hint: Leave empty for a key that never expires.
api_keys_created_description: Your new API key has been created. Copy it now -- it will not be shown again.
api_keys_one_time_warning: This key will not be shown again. Copy it now and store it securely.
api_keys_revoke_description: Revoke '{name}'? Any integrations using this key will stop working immediately.
api_keys_revoke_confirm_label: Type the key name to confirm
api_keys_no_permission_description: You do not have permission to manage API keys in this organization.
api_keys_no_org_description: Select an organization to manage its API keys.
talk_dp_frame_triage_gate: Issue exists with clear title and body
talk_dp_frame_frame_goal: Define the problem, constraints, and scope
talk_dp_frame_annotation: S-tier skips framing — goes straight to implement
talk_dp_shape_analyze_goal: Deep technical exploration — risks, alternatives, recommendations
talk_dp_shape_spec_goal: Define what we'll build — acceptance criteria, breadboard, slices
talk_dp_shape_annotation: F-lite skips analysis — frame is sufficient context for spec
talk_dp_build_plan_goal: Break spec into tasks, pick agents, define order
talk_dp_build_implement_goal: Create worktree, spawn agents, write code
talk_dp_build_annotation: Test-first: tester writes failing tests, then domain agents implement
talk_dp_verify_review_goal: Fresh agents review code they didn't write
talk_dp_verify_review_fresh: No agent reviews code it wrote
talk_dp_ship_promote_goal: Merge staging → main with version bump and changelog
talk_dp_ship_annotation: Promotion batches all staging changes into one release
talk_dp_compress_subtitle: Formal notation rewrite for skills and agents
talk_dp_compress_annotation: Every skill and agent in this project is compressed
talk_dp_next_subtitle: Where we're headed — projects to watch and features in the pipeline.
talk_dp_next_pi_desc: Agent-first OS — persistent agents, ambient intelligence, no clipboard required.
talk_dp_next_public_api_desc: REST SDK surface, API keys, webhooks & developer portal
talk_dp_next_quality_item1: Automated security auditing on every PR
talk_dp_next_quality_item3: Biome upgrade path & strict rule expansion
